text: I'm telling you now this town is
accursed I've started 20 years ago it's
the night of the Valentine's Day dance
the Union Hall
the biggest event of the year they've
been a tradition for over a hundred
years everybody was there except for
seven miners who routed the Haneda mine
five of them still down below two
supervisors were waiting for the men to
come up anxious to get to the party they
left before the men were safely out
failing to check the methane gas levels
in the tunnels down below five men were
buried alive as the town continued its
party for six weeks we dug round the
clock to try to save them after we broke
through one man was found alive I was
the one in fun Harry warden spent the
next year in the state mental hospitals
exactly one year later on Valentine's
Day he came back to town he killed the
two supervisors who would left the horse
to your cleaner then he cut out their
hearts stuffed a minute heart-shaped
candy boxes that night at the dance fell
in the boxes blood dripping out the
sides inside was a note a warning from
Harry never to hold the Valentine's
dance ever
every February 14th Perry comes back to
town his pickaxe stained with blood
waiting in the shadows of the henagar
mine just for someone to kill should
they not heed his warning
[Music]
